name: Sig
summary:
In Sig, players are thrust into a dystopian future where humanity is on the brink of extinction. As a top-down shooter dungeon crawler, the game combines fast-paced combat with exploration and discovery. Players must navigate through a series of challenging levels and uncover the source of the existential threat facing humanity.
Along the way, they will discover secrets about their own identity and the world they inhabit.
Can you save humanity and unravel the mysteries of Sig?
